Author: princess-kitty-belle
Text: Is it possible to maybe see a dietitian in regards to getting some proper advice?  All I know is that with bulimia, it is important to get regular, adequate meals to reduce the frequency of b/ping. From my understanding, binges either have a physiological trigger (hunger) or emotional trigger, and ensuring adequate nutrition can take out some of that. Sorry I can't be more specific, this is just some general knowledge I have.
